message.content: {"id": "17894", "title": "Bug 17894: Open Mode pref not reset by Restore Defaults", "description": "When changing the Open Mode preference to Single Click and selecting both checkboxes, restoring the defaults does not revert it back to Double Click and clear both checkboxes.", "OB": "The Open Mode preference remains set to Single Click and both checkboxes remain selected after selecting 'Restore Defaults' option.", "EB": "The Open Mode preference should revert to Double Click and both checkboxes should be cleared after selecting 'Restore Defaults' option.", "SR": "Modify the code so that selecting 'Restore Defaults' option reverts the Open Mode preference to Double Click and clears both checkboxes."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
